verifiedBadge.title: Verified account
verifiedBadge.description: Email, phone, identity, and address checks are complete. This helps you trade with more confidence.

market.title: Market
market.noAdsDescription: Create an {currency} ad to get started, or switch to another currency.

order.paymentTimeTooltip: Complete your payment within {minutes} minutes after placing the order.
order.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. Add funds to your wallet before creating an order.
order.orderExists: You already have an active order for this ad. Complete the existing order before placing a new one.
order.orderCreationError: There was an error when creating the order. Please try again.

paymentMethod.title: Payment method
paymentMethod.addCompatibleMethod: Add a supported payment method to continue
paymentMethod.addSupportedMethod: Add a supported payment method to continue
paymentMethod.addOneOfTheseMethods: Add one of these payment methods
paymentMethod.duplicateMethodDescription: A payment method with the same values already exists. Add a new one.
paymentMethod.addError: There was an error when adding the payment method. Please try again.
paymentMethod.searchDifferent: Search for a different payment method.

complaint.title: Submit a complaint
complaint.buyer_underpaid: I received less than the agreed amount.
complaint.buyer_overpaid: I received more than the agreed amount.
complaint.seller_not_released: I've made the payment, but the seller hasn't released the funds.
complaint.buyer_underpaid_buyer: I couldn't complete the full payment.
complaint.buyer_overpaid_buyer: I paid more than the agreed amount.
complaint.helpText: If your issue isn't listed, contact us via live chat for help.

chat.disclaimerText: Deriv will never contact you via WhatsApp to ask for your personal information. Always ignore any messages from numbers claiming to be from Deriv.
chat.disclaimerNoteText: In case of a dispute, we'll use this chat as a reference.
chat.errorPii: Please avoid sharing personal information like phone numbers, addresses, or ID details for your security.
chat.errorLink: Links and URLs are not permitted in this chat.
chat.errorProfanity: Please keep the conversation professional and avoid offensive language.
chat.errorPromotionalContent: Promotional content and advertisements are not allowed.
chat.errorOffPlatformCommunication: Please keep the conversation within this platform. We cannot assist with requests to communicate elsewhere.
chat.errorHumanAttention: Threatening or harassing language is not tolerated. Please communicate respectfully.
chat.errorHarassment: Please do not impersonate Deriv staff or misrepresent your identity.
chat.errorFakeIdentity: Never share passwords, OTPs, or login credentials. Deriv staff will never ask for this information in chat.
chat.errorSensitiveDataRequests: Your message requires additional review. Please wait while we connect you with a specialist.
chat.errorMiscellaneous: Your message doesn't meet our community guidelines. Please try again.

orderDetails.title: Order details
orderDetails.cashTransactionWarning: Cash transactions may carry risks. For safer payments, use bank transfers or e-wallets.
orderDetails.dontCancelIfPaid: Don't cancel if you've already paid.
orderDetails.textCopiedToClipboard: The text has been copied to your clipboard.
orderDetails.ratingDeadline: You have until {deadline} to rate this transaction.
orderDetails.awaitingPaymentTooltip: Wait for the buyer to complete their payment.
orderDetails.failedToLoadOrderDetails: Failed to load order details. Please try again.

profile.title: Profile
profile.bronzeTierDescription: Default tier for new users with basic trading limits.
profile.silverTierDescription: Trusted trader with higher limits and proven activity.
profile.goldTierDescription: Experienced trader with strong history and higher privileges.
profile.diamondTierDescription: Top-tier trader with maximum daily limits and excellent record.
profile.tradePartnersTooltip: Total number of users you've successfully traded with.
profile.tradeVolumeLifetimeTooltip: The total value of all trades completed in your lifetime.
profile.tradeVolume30DaysTooltip: The total value of all completed trades in the last 30 days.
profile.startFollowing: Start following users to see them here.
profile.whenUsersFollow: When users follow you, they'll appear here.
profile.unfollowDescription: You're about to unfollow this user. You'll lose quick access to their profile and active ads.
profile.unblockDescription: Unblock them if you'd like to interact with this advertiser again.
profile.blockedUsersAppear: Users you block will appear here.
profile.startAddingPaymentMethods: You haven't added any payment method yet.
profile.deletePaymentMethodDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?
profile.unableToDeletePaymentMethod: Unable to delete this payment method.
profile.paymentMethodLinkedToOrder: This payment method is linked to one of your orders and can't be deleted.
profile.paymentMethodLinkedToAd: This payment method is linked to one of your ads and can't be deleted.
profile.unableToUpdatePaymentMethod: Unable to update this payment method.
profile.paymentMethodInUseByOrder: This payment method is currently being used by an open order and cannot be modified.
profile.cannotUpdatePaymentMethod: You can't update this payment method
profile.validationSymbolsOnly: Only letters, numbers, spaces, and symbols -+.,'#@():; are allowed

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.noAssetsDescription: Make your first deposit and begin your trading journey today.
wallet.noTransactionsForCurrency: No transactions for the selected currency
wallet.chooseCurrencyDescription: Choose which currency you would like to {action}.
wallet.transferUnsuccessfulMessage: We couldn't process your transfer. Please try again.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.

myAds.title: All ads
myAds.hideMyAdsTooltip: Hidden ads won't appear on the Market page.
myAds.adCreatedMessage:
You've successfully created Ad ({type} {id}).

If your ad doesn't receive an order within 3 days, it will be deactivated.
myAds.adUpdatedMessage:
You've successfully updated Ad ({type} {id}).

Your changes have been saved and are now live.
myAds.errorLoadingAds: Failed to load ads. Please try again.
myAds.errorLoadingAdsMessage: Failed to load ads. Please try again later.
myAds.hideAdsError: Failed to hide your ads. Please try again.
myAds.showAdsError: Failed to show your ads. Please try again.
myAds.noAdsDescription: Looking to buy or sell? You can post your own ad for others to respond.
myAds.deleteAdDescription: You will not be able to restore it.
myAds.deleteAdError: There was an error when deleting the advert. Please try again.
myAds.updateAdError: There was an error when updating the advert. Please try again.
myAds.visibilityStatusDescription: Your ad isn't visible to others. Here's why:
myAds.visibilityStatusMultipleReasons: Your ad isn't listed on Market due to the following reasons:

advertInactive.title: Your ad is inactive
advertInactive.description: Activate your ad to make it visible to other traders.

advertRemaining.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertRemaining.description: Your ad's remaining amount is below the minimum order.

advertiserDailyLimit.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserDailyLimit.description: Your remaining daily limit is below the minimum order. Lower the minimum to list your ad or wait for the limit to reset within 24 hours.

advertiserBalance.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserBalance.description: Your balance is lower than your ad's minimum order. Add funds or lower the minimum to list your ad.

advertiserAdvertsUnlisted.title: Your ads aren't visible
advertiserAdvertsUnlisted.description: You've paused all your ad. Activate your ads to make it visible to other traders.

advertiserStatus.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserStatus.description: Contact us via live chat for help.

advertiserScheduleUnavailable.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserScheduleUnavailable.description: It's outside your business hours. Update your schedule or wait until your active hours.

advertiserTempBan.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserTempBan.description: Your account is temporarily restricted. Check your profile for details.

advertiserNoPrivateGroups.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertiserNoPrivateGroups.description: Youâ€™re no longer in the Diamond tier, so closed group ads are no longer eligible and are hidden from the market. To list this ad on the market page, change its visibility from Closed Group to Everyone.

advertFloatRateDisabled.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertFloatRateDisabled.description: Floating rates are no longer available for this currency pair. Switch to a fixed rate to make your ad visible.

advertNoPaymentMethods.title: Your ad isn't visible
advertNoPaymentMethods.description: This ad doesn't have a payment method. Add one to make it visible to other traders.

visibilityStatus.shareMessage: Hi! I'd like to exchange {currency} at {rate} on Deriv P2P. If you're interested, check out my ad {url}. Thanks!
visibilityStatus.shareTelegramMessage: Hi! I'd like to exchange {currency} at {rate} on Deriv P2P. If you're interested, check out my ad. Thanks!
visibilityStatus.qrCodeDescription: Scan this code to order via Deriv P2P

orders.title: Orders
orders.noActiveOrdersDescription: Buy or sell from the market, or create an ad to start receiving orders.
orders.noPastOrdersDescription: View and manage your past orders here.
orders.fraudWarning: Providing fraudulent documents will result in a permanent ban.
orders.ensurePayment: Ensure you've paid {amount} {currency} to {name} and upload the receipt as proof of payment.
orders.otpSentTo: Enter the 6-digit code sent to {email}. This step verifies your identity before releasing payment to the other party.
orders.incorrectCode: Incorrect code. You have {attempts} attempt{plural} left.
orders.maxAttemptsReached: Max attempts reached. Try again in 10 minutes.
orders.tooManyAttemptsDescription: It looks like you've made too many attempts to confirm this order. Please try again after 10 minutes.

adForm.orderTimeLimitTooltip: Orders will expire if they aren't completed within this timeframe.
adForm.audienceTooltip: You can filter who interacts with your ads based on their location or P2P history. Stricter filters may reduce ad visibility.
adForm.instructionsDisclaimer: This information will be visible to everyone. Don't share your phone number or personal details.
adForm.totalAmountGreaterThanZero: Total amount must be greater than 0.
adForm.minAmountGreaterThanZero: Minimum order must be greater than 0.
adForm.minAmountLessThanMax: Minimum order must be less than maximum order.
adForm.maxAmountGreaterThanZero: Maximum order must be greater than 0.
adForm.maxAmountGreaterThanMin: Maximum order must be greater than minimum order.
adForm.minAmountLessThanTotal: Minimum order should not exceed total amount.
adForm.maxAmountLessThanTotal: Maximum order should not exceed total amount.
adForm.adCreatedSuccess:
You've successfully created a {type} advert.

If your ad doesn't receive an order within 3 days, it will be deactivated.
adForm.duplicateRateTitle: You already have an ad with this rate
adForm.duplicateRateMessage: You have another active ad with the same rate for this currency pair and order type. Set a different rate.
adForm.rangeOverlapMessage: You've an active ad with an order range that includes this one. Update that ad or change this range to continue.
adForm.adLimitReachedMessage: You can only have 3 active ads for this currency pair and order type. Delete an ad to create a new one.
adForm.advertFloatRateMaximumMessage: The floating rate you entered is higher than the allowed limit.
adForm.insufficientBalanceMessage: You don't have enough balance to create this ad
adForm.amountExceedsBalanceMessage: The total amount exceeds your available balance. Please enter a smaller amount.
adForm.invalidExchangeRateMessage: The exchange rate you provided is invalid.
adForm.invalidOrderAmountMessage: The order amount limits are invalid.
adForm.genericErrorCodeMessage: Please try again or contact support.
adForm.genericProcessingErrorMessage: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.
adForm.cancelAdCreationDescription: If you cancel, the details you've entered will be lost.
adForm.adVisibilityUpdateDescription: You won't be able to change this ad back to a closed group listing unless you become a Diamond tier member again.

advertiser.noActiveAds: This advertiser do not have any active ads.
advertiser.failedToLoad: Failed to load advertiser profile. Please try again.
advertiser.blockDescription: You won't see {nickname}'s ads, and they can't place orders on yours.
advertiser.unblockDescription: Unblock them if you'd like to interact with this advertiser again.

kyc.accessP2PMessage: To continue, complete the remaining steps:
kyc.resubmitIdentityAndAddress: Resubmit your proof of identity and address to continue using P2P.
kyc.resubmitIdentity: Resubmit your proof of identity to continue using P2P.
kyc.resubmitAddress: Resubmit your proof of address to continue using P2P.

shareAdPage.shareMessage: Hi! I'd like to exchange {currency} at {rate} on Deriv P2P. If you're interested, check out my ad {url}. Thanks!
shareAdPage.shareTelegramMessage: Hi! I'd like to exchange {currency} at {rate} on Deriv P2P. If you're interested, check out my ad. Thanks!
shareAdPage.qrCodeDescription: Scan this code to order via Deriv P2P

ratingSidebar.title: Rate and recommend
ratingSidebar.ratingLabel: How would you rate this transaction?
ratingSidebar.ratingRequiredDescription: Please select a star rating before submitting.
